Description:
Should have experience in softwares like Civil 3D, sewerGems, waterGems, Stormcad, autocad, Microstation, Microdrain.
Experience in 1D and 2D hydraulic modelling (Infoworks ICM) of storm water network.
Degree in Civil Engineering.
Minimum 5 years experience in storm water network, Drainage, Water Supply, Storm Water Drainage, Sewerage.
Knowledge of analysing and monitoring data.
Advanced knowledge of the design and operation of surface water and foul systems.
Competent to advanced skills level in Hydraulic Modelling packages.
Ability to communicate verbally and in writing in English is mandatory.Job Details
